text: core zero is an online learning platform
and the mission of course zero is to
imagine a world where every student
graduates confident and prepared we have
a library of more than 25 million core
specific documents 25 million and over
students and educators the flagship
product is the Coursera comm platform
and we support normally website but also
mobile apps and this is our customer
facing platform and be our 24/7 365 days
available online so one of the key
things for us was disaster recovery and
high availability we had a hosted
colocation vendor initially for our data
center biggest pain points were that on
the smallest sort of notice we would
have to move from one location to
another it was about to happen again so
it was like this is a perfect point at
which we go to something which Auto
scales and it is something that gives us
the reliability that we need so that we
can serve our customers we wanted to
move to SSD drives and it took us three
months with the vendor to move to SSD
drives but with Amazon you know it was
immediate the IT organization within
core zero also offers Big Data services
we also use you know the kubernetes
cluster we use Athena for all the big
data infrastructure that we want to
eventually you know serve machine
learning so given the the landscape of
things that we want to accomplish and
the suite of offerings from Amazon Web
Services the decision was made based on
that so all of our data goes into s3 and
we leverage Athena to query the big data
across many transactions to see what
students are looking for what are the
activities happening on our platform big
data processing is something that we get
out of it
yes platform because we want to
personalize our search and
recommendations that's something that my
team is primarily focused on we are
leveraging AWS sage maker which is the
machine learning platform so which has
all the latest and greatest machine
learning toolkits baked into it so we
are able to move from experimentation to
development to deployment within a short
cycle based on the mission that we are
